label: 雲林院
本: The Clear Mirror:  A Chronicle of Japanese Court During the Kamakura Period, (1185-1333) . Stanford University Press . 1998
説明文: Also Unrin-in. A temple in the outskirts of the capital in what is now Murasakino, Kita-ku, Kyoto. It was famous for its enlightenment sermons (bodaikō), expositions of the Lotus Sutra that were believed to lead to enlightenment and Buddhahood. [菩提講]
